title: Airtel Premier Soars High With British Airways
text:
11 August 2015 17:28 CET Airtel Premier Soars High With British Airways By Daily Guide 
Rosy Fynn, Customer Experience Director at Airtel Ghana and Kevin Leung, Commercial Manager for British Airways and Iberia in Ghana in a pose 
Airtel Ghana, multiple award-winning company and British Airways, a full service global airline, have announced a partnership that will give Airtel Ghana's premier customers an exclusive discounted offer on British Airways fares. 
The partnership forms part of Airtel Ghana's quest to provide its customers with unique services that complement their lifestyles. Through this partnership, Airtel customers will receive up to 15 percent discount on British Airways tickets. 
Rosy Fynn, Customer Experience Director said, 'At Airtel Ghana we believe in delivering world-class experience to our customers. British Airways is the ideal partner and compliments Airtel Premier because of their focus in providing top class service to their customers. By establishing this partnership, we are providing our customers with flights at discounted rates to the United Kingdom, Europe and North America.' 
Kevin Leung, Country Commercial Manager at British Airways said, 'We are pleased that Airtel Premier customers now have the advantage of travelling between Accra and London and over 150 destinations at specially discounted rates. Airtel Premier customers will be able to experience our award-winning products such as Club World and World Traveller Plus and our very special services both on the ground and in the air.' 
Customers of Airtel Ghana can access this exclusive offer online via a dedicated website provided by British Airways. 
The offer is from 5th August 2015 to 31st October 2015 and for outbound travel from Accra to British Airways destinations in the United Kingdom, Europe and North America. Tickets are valid for one year from the date of purchase. 
To add to the excitement of this partnership, two lucky customers will be rewarded with free tickets to any of the selected British Airways destinations in United Kingdom, Europe and North America. 
Airtel Premier has been at the forefront of introducing bespoke products and services to its Premier customers. 
Premier customers enjoy free access to over 700 VIP Airport Lounges worldwide. Membership to Airtel Premier is open to all Airtel Ghana's subscribers who meet a monthly threshold.
